Class WindowTester

  • java.lang.Object
    • abbot.tester.Robot

          • abbot.tester.WindowTester
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AWTConstants
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DialogTester, FrameTester

    public class WindowTester
extends ContainerTester
    Provides user actions on a Window.

    • Method Detail

      • deriveTag

        public java.lang.String deriveTag(java.awt.Component comp)
        The window's size seems as good an ID as any. If someone has a bunch of frameless windows floating about, they can come up with a better ID.
        Overrides:
        deriveTag in class ComponentTester

      • actionClose

        public void actionClose(java.awt.Component c)
        Send a WINDOW_CLOSING event to the window, equivalent to the user closing the window through the window manager. Note that this will not necessarily close the window.

      • actionMove

        public void actionMove(java.awt.Component w,
              int screenx,
              int screeny)
        Move the window to the given location.

      • actionMoveBy

        public void actionMoveBy(java.awt.Component w,
                int dx,
                int dy)
        Move the window to the given location.

      • actionResize

        public void actionResize(java.awt.Component w,
                int width,
                int height)
        Resize the given window. Note that this will fail on frames or dialogs which are not resizable.

      • actionResizeBy

        public void actionResizeBy(java.awt.Component w,
                  int dx,
                  int dy)
        Resize the given window. Note that this will fail on frames or dialogs which are not resizable.

      • actionActivate

        public void actionActivate(java.awt.Window w)
        Activate the given Window.
